title: Ballard High grad Matthew Law's star continues to rise - king5.com
snippet: Matthew Law is a Seattle-born filmmaker and actor who landed a role on the Emmy-winning comedy series "Abbott Elementary". He credits his film program at Ballard High School for giving him his foundation and his mom for teaching him an appreciation for art and cinema.
